btk.obs_conditions module
=========================
The obs_conditions module defines the :class:`~btk.obs_conditions.Cutout` class, which acts as a standard container for the observing conditions for a given band and survey ; the :class:`~btk.obs_conditions.ObsConditions` class is also defined, and dictates how the cutouts are created for each band and survey.

.. automodule:: btk.obs_conditions
